ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Sit-in
ygData.msgSnippet: ... or 150 people sitting in on one server?   I m not arguing your point, just askin the question.   I think that you may very well get more notice by doing it
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Do you think that Verant would notice 10 people sitting in on each server,
or 150 people sitting in on one server? I'm not arguing your point, just
askin the question. I think that you may very well get more notice by
doing it all on one server, if in fact you could get a huge turn out. If
you did it on all servers you would just spread it out more and get smaller
turnouts on all servers instead of a huge showing on one.
-The event is on just one server: Fennin Ro. I don't know who started
this idea of mulitple servers, but please check the official web page for
all information. http://freepages.ugo.com/clericsrequest/


> On a side note, I think the point is moot... I think the powers that be
have determined that that armor is all good and I don't believe they will be
changing anything, even if we get 2000 clerics to sit in at freeport.
>
- Again, I realize there are those who believe that we our reaching for
our goals in vain, but it can never be said that we did not try. In fact,
it is my firm belief that never trying is worse than failure.
